mapper.select: select tm.id, tm.community_id as communityId, tm.uid, tm.goods_name as goodsName, tm.price, tm.goods_explain as goodsExplain, tm.negotiable, tm.state, tm.category_id as categoryId,tm.label_id as labelId, tm.click as click, tm.phone as phone,tm.images as images,tm.shield as shield, tm.deleted as deleted, tm.create_time as createTime,tm.update_time as updateTime, tpml.label as labelName,tpmc.category as categoryName from t_proprietor_market tm left join t_proprietor_market_category tpmc on tm.category_id = tpmc.category_id left join t_proprietor_market_label tpml on tm.label_id = tpml.label_id where tm.deleted = 0 and tm.state = #{query.state} and tm.uid = #{query.uid} limit #{page},#{size}
select count(*) from t_proprietor_market tm where tm.deleted = 0 and tm.state =1 and tm.shield= 0

select tm.id, tm.community_id , tm.uid, tm.goods_name as goodsName, tm.price, tm.goods_explain as goodsExplain, tm.negotiable, tm.state, tm.category_id as categoryId,tm.label_id as labelId, tm.click as click, tm.phone as phone,tm.images as images,tm.shield as shield, tm.deleted as deleted, tm.create_time as createTime,tm.update_time as updateTime, tpml.label as labelName,tpmc.category as categoryName from t_proprietor_market tm left join t_proprietor_market_category tpmc on tm.category_id = tpmc.category_id left join t_proprietor_market_label tpml on tm.label_id = tpml.label_id where tm.deleted = 0 and tm.state = 1 and tm.shield= 0 and tm.category_id=#{query.categoryId} order by tm.click desc limit #{page},#{size}

select count(*) from t_proprietor_market tm left join t_proprietor_market_category tpmc on tm.category_id = tpmc.category_id left join t_proprietor_market_label tpml on tm.label_id = tpml.label_id left join t_user tu on tm.uid = tu.uid where tm.remove = 0 and tm.shield = 1

select tm.id, tm.community_id , tm.uid as uid, tm.goods_name as goodsName, tm.price, tm.goods_explain as goodsExplain, tm.negotiable, tm.state, tm.category_id as categoryId,tm.label_id as labelId, tm.remove, tm.click as click, tm.phone as phone,tm.images as images,tm.shield as shield, tm.deleted as deleted, tm.create_time as createTime,tm.update_time as updateTime, tpml.label as labelName,tpmc.category as categoryName,tu.real_name as realName from t_proprietor_market tm left join t_proprietor_market_category tpmc on tm.category_id = tpmc.category_id left join t_proprietor_market_label tpml on tm.label_id = tpml.label_id left join t_user tu on tm.uid = tu.uid where tm.remove = 0 and tm.shield = 1 limit #{page},#{size}
